Generated original text: A road vehicle has an owner and operator, both being persons, i.e. human or non-human entities recognized as having privileges and obligations.
A road vehicle is uniquely identified by its vehicle identification number which is recorded in the register of road vehicles.

A road vehicle operated on the roads must be entered in the register of road vehicles if the person operating it has permanent residence, long-term residence or, if a citizen of another member state, temporary residence of at least 6 months per calendar year in the territory of the country, or has been granted asylum.

Source class: municipal authority of a municipality with extended competence
Generated original text: The municipal authority of a municipality with extended competence registers a road vehicle in the register of road vehicles on the basis of a written application by the owner of the road vehicle.

The municipal authority checks that: - the road vehicle's roadworthiness has been approved, - value added tax has been paid on the acquisition of the road vehicle from another member state, if a special legal provision so provides, - the road vehicle is not listed as missing or stolen in the Schengen Information System or in the information system of the state police or this information is not established by another procedure, - it is not an incomplete road vehicle

Source class: application for the registration of a road vehicle in the register of road vehicles
Generated original text: An application for the registration of a road vehicle in the register of road vehicles shall include - the type and category of the road vehicle, the road vehicle's manufacturer's factory mark, its trade name, the type of road vehicle, and the purpose for which the road vehicle is intended, - details of the owner of the road vehicle - details of the operator of the road vehicle if the owner is not also the operator of the road vehicle.

Source class: municipal authority of the municipality with extended competence

A technical inspection station is a workplace specialised in carrying out technical inspections of road vehicles.

When registering a road vehicle in the register of road vehicles, the municipal authority of the municipality with extended competence shall issue a registration certificate of the road vehicle to the applicant.
The municipal authority of the municipality with extended competence, when registering a road vehicle in the register of road vehicles, shall further assign a registration plate to the road vehicle.

When issuing a registration plate, the municipal authority of the municipality with extended jurisdiction shall affix a sticker to the plate issued, indicating the date of the periodic technical inspection.

If the road vehicle has been found to be seriously defective, the municipal authority of the municipality with extended jurisdiction shall mark on the sticker the date of the repeated technical inspection, which shall be the last day of the month following the month of registration of the road vehicle in the register of road vehicles.
If the road vehicle has been found to be dangerously defective, the municipal authority of the municipality with extended jurisdiction shall not affix the sticker to the registration plate.
